title: Tens of Thousands in Iran Mourn Mahsa Amini, Whose Death Set Off Protests
description: While the security forces cracked down on demonstrations across the country, state media reported a deadly attack on a mosque in the southern city of Shiraz, adding to the atmosphere of tension.
dc:creator: Farnaz Fassihi and Cora Engelbrecht
media:description: This image, posted on Twitter, shows an unveiled woman standing on top of a vehicle as thousands make their way toward Aichi Cemetery in Saghez, Mahsa Aminiâ€™s hometown.
